info.title: Process Order Confirmation
info.description: You can create time ticket and time event confirmations as well as confirmations on order level, read them, and cancel the confirmations on time ticket, time event, or order level. Before creating a confirmation, you can fetch the proposed data for quantities, work activities, dates and times, personnel data, and goods movements depending on the type of confirmation.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, and cancel confirmations for process orders using this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Reads information on the header data of process order confirmations.
get.description: Reads information available on the header data of existing process order confirmations. You can use the standard OData system query options to refine your request.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

post.summary: Creates a new process order confirmation.
post.description: Creates the header data for a new process order confirmation using the properties you provide. If desired, a material document for goods movement can be created together with the confirmation as well.

parameters.name: ConfirmationGroup
parameters.description: Collective ID of Order Confirmations

parameters.name: ConfirmationCount
parameters.description: Identifier of Single Order Confirmation

get.summary: Reads information on the header data of a single process order confirmation.
get.description: Reads the information for a specific process order confirmation that you specify using the confirmation group and the confirmation count.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

parameters.name: ConfirmationGroup
parameters.description: Collective ID of Order Confirmations

parameters.name: ConfirmationCount
parameters.description: Identifier of Single Order Confirmation

get.summary: Reads the header data of a process order confirmation together with the corresponding material documents for goods movements.
get.description: Reads the header data of a single process order confirmation that you specify using the confirmation group and confirmation count. The response includes the material documents for goods movements belonging to the confirmation.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

get.summary: Reads the material document for goods movements.
get.description: Reads information available on the material document items of existing confirmations. You can use the standard OData system query options to refine your request.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Collective ID of Order Confirmations

parameters.name: ConfirmationCount
parameters.description: Identifier of Single Order Confirmation

parameters.name: MaterialDocument
parameters.description: Number of Material Document

parameters.name: MaterialDocumentItem
parameters.description: Material Document Item

parameters.name: MaterialDocumentYear
parameters.description: Material Document Year

get.summary: Reads information on a single material document for goods movements.
get.description: Reads the information of a single material document item that you specify using the confirmation group number, the confirmation count, the number of the material document, the item in the material document, and the material document year.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.description: Collective ID of Order Confirmations

parameters.name: ConfirmationCount
parameters.description: Identifier of Single Order Confirmation

parameters.name: MaterialDocument
parameters.description: Number of Material Document

parameters.name: MaterialDocumentItem
parameters.description: Material Document Item

parameters.name: MaterialDocumentYear
parameters.description: Material Document Year

get.summary: Reads the material document for goods movements together with the corresponding batch characteristics.
get.description: Reads a material document for goods movements that you specify using the confirmation group, the confirmation count, the material document number, the materialdocument item number, and the material document year. The response includes the batch characteristics belonging to the material document.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the batch characteristics in material documents for goods movements.
get.description: Reads information available on the batch characteristics in material document items of existing confirmations. You can use the standard OData system query options to refine your request.

get.summary: Reads information on a single batch characteristic in a material document for goods movements.
get.description: Reads the information on a single batch characteristic in a material document item that you specify using the confirmation group, the confirmation count,the material document number, the item in the material document, the material document year, the plant, the material, the batch, and the internal ID of the batch characteristic.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description: Cancels a process order confirmation that you specify using the confirmation group and confirmation count.

parameters.name: ConfirmationGroup
parameters.description:
Confirmation Group  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: ConfirmationCount
parameters.description:
Order Confirmation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: PostingDate
parameters.description:
Posting Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

parameters.name: ConfirmationText
parameters.description:
Confirmation Text  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: ExternalSystemConfirmation
parameters.description:
External Key  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

post.summary: Fetches proposal data for quantities, work activities, dates and times, and personnel data for confirmations.
post.description: Fetches proposal data of a confirmation that you specify using the necessary properties depending on the type of confirmation.

parameters.name: ConfirmationGroup
parameters.description:
Confirmation Group  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: OrderID
parameters.description:
Manufacturing Order  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: OrderOperation
parameters.description:
Operation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: OrderSuboperation
parameters.description:
Suboperation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: OrderConfirmationRecordType
parameters.description:
Record Type  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: ConfirmationUnit
parameters.description:
Display Unit/Measure  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: ConfirmationUnitISOCode
parameters.description:
ISO code  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: ConfirmationUnitSAPCode
parameters.description:
Internal SAP Code  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: ConfirmationYieldQuantity
parameters.description:
Yield Quantity  
(Value needs to be suffixed with `M`)

parameters.name: ConfirmationScrapQuantity
parameters.description:
Scrap Quantity  
(Value needs to be suffixed with `M`)

parameters.name: QuantityIsToBeProposed
parameters.description: Propose Quantities

parameters.name: ActivityIsToBeProposed
parameters.description: Propose Activities

parameters.name: DateAndTimeIsToBeProposed
parameters.description: Propose Dates

parameters.name: PersonnelIsToBeProposed
parameters.description: Propose Personnel

post.summary: Fetches proposal data for goods movements of a confirmation.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET ProcOrdConf2 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
